total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the rows in the input grid that are completely filled with 1s.
Q2: Change all the 1s in the rows identified in Q1 to 2s.
Q3: Identify the rows in the input grid that are completely filled with 8s.
Q4: Keep the rows identified in Q3 as they are.
Q5: Identify the rows in the input grid that have a combination of 1s and 8s.
Q6: Change the 1s in the rows identified in Q5 to 2s, only if they are surrounded by 8s on both sides.
Q7: Keep the remaining cells in the grid as they are.
